TopicTitle: How to find as many Walmart electronic discounts as possible

Articles.Content:
I’m looking into getting a new computer (laptop) sometime soon, and it’s $800, so I’m curious as to how to reduce that price as much as possible via discounts, coupons (online or real) and so forth.

Thanks for the help.

i would avoid buying expensive electronics at walmart and look online

www.newegg.com

4 hours ago, invision said:

i would avoid buying expensive electronics at walmart and look online

www.newegg.com

I'd agree but it's exactly what I want and prices for anything similar only seem to skyrocket elsewhere. I've spent nearly a year bouncing around looking for other hardware ranging from desktops to mobile computers and this one I've found seems to suit me the best thus far.

I'm just looking for a way to slash the cost.
